name: Crossroad (W101)
purpose: To warn that a hazard in the form of a crossroad is ahead
action: If your vehicle (or load) is higher than the indicated height in metres, another road not indicated by this sign, must be used.

name: Height limit (R204, TR204)
purpose: To warn you against a height restriction ahead.
action: Approach cautiously, look carefully and be able to stop if cross-traffic requires it.
